mapper.select: SELECT count(*) as cnt FROM log2timeline
SELECT count(*) as cnt FROM OSInstallation
SELECT count(*) as cnt FROM StorageDevice
SELECT count(*) as cnt FROM InstalledApp
SELECT count(*) as cnt FROM WebHistory
SELECT count(*) as cnt FROM WebDownload
SELECT count(*) as cnt FROM WebCache
SELECT count(*) as cnt FROM WebCookie

select source, date_format(datetime, '%m/%d/%Y %h:%i:%s %p') as date, count(*) as cnt from log2timeline where 1=1
group by source, datetime order by source, datetime
SELECT count(*) as cnt FROM lv1_os_win_event_logs

SELECT case_id, evd_id, par_id, app_id, app_name, target_file_path, arguments, volume_name, volume_serial_number, target_file_created_time, target_file_last_modified_time, target_file_last_accessed_time, jump_list_type, drive_type, computer_name, target_mac_address, target_file_size, entry_created_time, entry_last_accessed_time, entry_id, most_recent_used, interaction_count, target_file_attributes, target_id_absolute_path, target_mft_entry_number, target_mft_sequence_number, pin_status, file_birth_droid, volume_birth_droid, file_droid, volume_droid FROM lv1_os_win_jumplist
limit #{offset}, #{pageSize}
SELECT count(*) as cnt FROM lv1_os_win_jumplist

SELECT case_id, evd_id, par_id, file_name, key_last_updated_time, file_extension, program_name, program_id, key_id, sha1_hash, os_component_flag, full_path, link_date, product_name, size, version, product_version, long_path_hash, binary_type, pe_file_flag, binary_file_version, binary_product_version, language_code, usn, legacy_flag, volume_guid, publisher, switch_back_context, description, last_modified_time, created_time, last_modified_2_time, pe_header_field_size_of_image, pe_header_hash,pe_header_checksum FROM lv1_os_win_reg_amcache_file_entries
limit #{offset}, #{pageSize}
SELECT count(*) as cnt FROM lv1_os_win_reg_amcache_file_entries
SELECT count(*) as cnt FROM lv1_os_win_reg_amcache_program_entries
SELECT count(*) as cnt FROM lv1_os_win_reg_installed_programs
